name: BitmapConversionOptions
shortdesc: Options for changing the document mode to Bitmap.

property.name: resolution
property.shortdesc: The output resolution (in pixels per inch)

property.name: patternName
property.shortdesc: The name of the pattern to use. Valid only when 'method' = custom.

property.name: frequency
property.shortdesc: The number of printer dots per inch. Valid only when 'method' = halftone screen. Range: 1.0 to 999.99.

property.name: angle
property.shortdesc: The angle (in degrees) at which to orient individual dots. Valid only when 'method' = halftone screen. Range: -180 to 180.

property.name: shape
property.shortdesc: The dot shape. Valid only when 'method' = halftone screen.
